seniority_level.evidence: No explicit years mentioned, but Master's degree preferred and specific tool expertise (OpenText Exstream) suggests mid-level experience needed to handle enterprise document design and template development.

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities involve designing and developing data-driven documents and forms, which falls under data engineering scope in enterprise content management context.

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on document templates, input/output formats, and unit testing suggests batch-oriented document generation workflows rather than real-time streaming.

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud platforms mentioned; focus on OpenText Exstream, which is typically deployed on-premise in enterprise content management environments.
